Uses of Class
org.elasticsearch.search.suggest.phrase.PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator

  • Packages that use PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator 
    Package Description
    org.elasticsearch.search.suggest.phrase  

    • Uses of PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator in org.elasticsearch.search.suggest.phrase

      Methods in org.elasticsearch.search.suggest.phrase that return PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.accuracy(float accuracy)
      Sets how similar the suggested terms at least need to be compared to the original suggest text tokens.
      static PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.candidateGenerator(String field)
      Creates a new DirectCandidateGenerator
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.maxEdits(Integer maxEdits)
      Sets the maximum edit distance candidate suggestions can have in order to be considered as a suggestion.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.maxInspections(Integer maxInspections)
      A factor that is used to multiply with the size in order to inspect more candidate suggestions.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.maxTermFreq(float maxTermFreq)
      Sets a maximum threshold in number of documents a suggest text token can exist in order to be corrected.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.minDocFreq(float minDocFreq)
      Sets a minimal threshold in number of documents a suggested term should appear in.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.minWordLength(int minWordLength)
      The minimum length a suggest text term must have in order to be corrected.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.postFilter(String postFilter)
      Sets a filter (analyzer) that is applied to each of the generated tokens before they are passed to the actual phrase scorer.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.preFilter(String preFilter)
      Sets a filter (analyzer) that is applied to each of the tokens passed to this candidate generator.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.prefixLength(int prefixLength)
      Sets the number of minimal prefix characters that must match in order be a candidate suggestion.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.size(int size)
      Sets the maximum suggestions to be returned per suggest text term.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.sort(String sort)
      Sets how to sort the suggest terms per suggest text token.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.stringDistance(String stringDistance)
      Sets what string distance implementation to use for comparing how similar suggested terms are.
      PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator PhraseSuggestionBuilder.DirectCandidateGenerator.suggestMode(String suggestMode)
      The global suggest mode controls what suggested terms are included or controls for what suggest text tokens, terms should be suggested for.
